Texts.Chs: 我收到一位埃癸人朋友送给我的特殊礼物。让我们打开它！
Texts.Eng: I received a special gift from an Aeginian friend. Let's open it!

Texts.Chs: 看来你在什么地方交到朋友了！承蒙一位不愿透露姓名的埃癸人致以的特别快递 ，他非常感谢你一直以来的支持。享受你的礼物吧！
Texts.Eng: It seems you've made friends somewhere! I've got a special delivery for you, courtesy of an Aegi who wouldn't share their name, but who greatly appreciates your continued support. Enjoy your present!
